short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skips you to the title card of an episode on CrunchyRoll. Currently works with One Piece and Black Clover.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of having to look in the comments to find the time of the title card while binging anime? Look no further! TimeSkip will look through the comments and skip you to the title card, all at the press of a button.
